title: cvROBO
description:
The app Flexit cvROBO provide the possibility to monitor and manage your robot vacuum cleaner cvROBO. 

The cvROBO app lets you:
• Program cleaning (daily or
weekly).
• Begin or end cleaning, even when you are not at home.
• Select the cleaning mode.
• Adjust the suction power.
• Adjust the volume of water used
for mopping.
• Activate or deactivate the
automatic self-cleaning function.
• See history
• Search for cvROBO if it has not
returned to the docking station.
